items.title: Logitech’s new Superstrike is a faster, more customizable gaming mouse
items.summary: Enthusiast gaming keyboard tech has made the jump to gaming mice - well, to one gaming mouse so far. The $179.99 Logitech G Pro X2 Superstrike is the first to feature analog sensors that use induction to register clicks faster than microswitches used in many mice. Those sensors allow for a host of cool features […]

While we did catch it down at $90 there a few times last year, deals have been hard to come by for this model as of late on Amazon. It comes in at a whole lot less than even the sale prices on the newer and largely similar 20,100mAh and $200 26,250mAh models – you can scope out the deals on those in Anker’s ongoing Valentine’s Day event.

items.title: Presidents Day weekend Switch game deals: Donkey Kong Bananza, Princess Peach 50% off, Xenoblade, Kirby, more
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Presidents Day sale, Amazon has now dropped a few notable Lightning deals on Switch games, alongside the ongoing deals on PS5 titles and more. Joining deals on Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition and Kirby’s Return to Dream Land Deluxe, Amazon is also now offering Princess Peach: Showtime! Down at $29.99 with free shipping for Prime members or in orders over $35. This is a straight up 50% off on a title rarely discounted at Amazon. These new offers are also joining a fresh offer via Woot on Donkey Kong Bananza down at $60 an a whole bunch more below.

  • Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition $40 (Reg. $60)
  • Kirby’s Return to Dream Land Deluxe $40 (Reg. $60)
  • Princess Peach: Showtime! $30 (Reg. $60)
  • Luigi’s Mansion 2 HD $40 (Reg. $60)
  • Donkey Kong Bananza $60 (Reg. $70)
  • And even more…

items.title: Lectric’s Presidents Day sale increases e-bike bundle savings up to $893 – get your next American-made ride starting from $999
items.summary:
Lectric has officially launched its Presidents Day Sale with increased e-bike bundle savings up to $893, one of the biggest sales events each year from the popular brand that sits beside Prime Day and Black Friday events. Among the massive increase in savings, our top pick for anyone looking to upgrade their commute is the Lectric XP4 750 Long-Range Folding Utility e-bikes with up to $514 in FREE gear at $1,299 shipped, which we went hands-on with in our review back over the summer. You would normally be spending up to $1,813 on these bundles if there were no savings, which gives you a LevelUp cargo rack, an Elite headlight, a suspension seatpost, an accordion-style bike lock, and a phone mount on four of the models, while the XP4 750 Tempest Grey Step-Over e-bike, specifically, is also getting a 5A fast charger that can recharge the bike from empty in up to 3.5 hours. Of course, there are also the standard XP4 Folding Utility e-bikes getting $79 bundles at $999 shipped. Head below to browse the full lineup of increased deals while they last!

more…
